requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo or better (you can run it on almost everything)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo or better (you can run it on almost everything)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
